package hello;

public class hello {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		int count = 0;
		int mark = 0;
		int percentage;
		
		do{
			mark = 96;
			count = count+1;
			System.out.println(count);
		}while(count<6);
		percentage=mark/6;
		System.out.println(percentage);
	}
}
